Name: Streets of Rage
About the game: What was once a happy, peaceful, productive city, has fallen into the hands of a secret criminal syndicate. Looting, random violence and destruction are rampant. Nobody is safe. Despite repeated refusals by their superiors, three young police officers were determined to tackle the problem head on. Eventually they created a special attack unit the only way they could – they quit the force. Take control of one of the three ex-officers and make the city a place where people no longer have to walk the Streets of Rage™!
Meta Title: Streets of Rage: Jan 26, 2011, SEGA and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Streets of Rage? Check out the release date (Jan 26, 2011), developer insights from SEGA, and a complete game summary.
